sections.title: Wall Newspaper / Bulletin Boards
body: I was in charge of designing and maintaining class wall newspaper/bulletin boards for over 6 years.
Some of the designs are displayed here.

sections.title: High School 1
sections.body: A career planning themed bulletin board (background) design.

sections.title: High School 2
sections.body: A friendship/classmates themed bulletin board (background) design.

sections.title: High School 3
sections.body: A Gao Kao themed bulletin board (background) design.
